title: Calamari ripieni
description: Preparing the squid can be a little tricky, so get your fishmonger to do this for you if you're unsure. Otherwise the recipe is very easy - a bit of prep then the oven does the rest.
ingredients: 3 tsp extra-virgin olive oil, plus extra to drizzle
100g/3½oz white bread, crusts removed, finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
